title: Riot Why Is New Aatrox rework champ getting instant killed in team fights.
body: Riot now makes champs balanced that makes team play more important, well i went Aatrox champ and in team fights i get focused and instant killed. And the new passive is just terrible i cant keep bloodwell up long enough for is to work and die my question is why is Aatrox not team based.

replies.body:
Suspect the change in kit will take some getting used to. Been around long enough to know that the day after major changes to a champ the purists come out and whine about it (I did the same vocally with xerath and taliyah and less vocally with ali - turns out I just needed to practice the new kit a bit more).

I reckon give it a run for a week to get used to it, perhaps even in norms, then come back with a breakdown of why it sucks / is bearable / is good.

I have faith enough in rito to know they've got some bright minds working on this stuff and they wouldnt cripple a champ just to piss people off.
Aatrox is completely turned into trash. His new passive is a completely dripping mess. Riot literally turned him to into a trashier trydermere

i have been playing Aatrox quiite regularly as my go to top lane jungle champ even tho you buffed everyone else and he was hard.... now he is about as useful as a cock flavoured lollypop. i can guarantee i wont be playing him again... passive - useless. bloodwell - messy complicated too quick to decay all the time.
For real, all anyone needs to do is cc you or dash away and by the time you catch them your bloodwell is empty which once again your passive is useless.. thanks for making it easier to decide to play another champ. What you did to aa over the last year or 2 is fuckin sad.. at least i know i dont play him now
and to think that this rework was to address his "health issues"
Build him as more of a tank than an assassin. If you ask me that rework would be fine... if they didn't gut bork in the same patch.
